mapper.sql: id, user_id, user_name, password, fixed_phone, qq, email, address, created_date, created, modified_date, modified
mapper.select: select * from license_user_external_info b, license_user_login l where b.user_id = l.user_id and l.login_name = #{login_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update license_user_external_info
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
